casebody.data:
Brian E. PELTIER, Employee, Plaintiff
v.
GREYHOUND LINES, INC., Employer and
CIGNA, Carrier, Defendants. No. 636P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Brian E. Peltier, Pro Se. Erin D. Eveson, Bettina Mumme, Raleigh, for Greyhound Lines, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 15th day of November 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of March 2006."

Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
